1.text: And the Lord said to me: Go yet again, and love a woman beloved of her friend, and an adulteress : as the Lord loveth the children of Israel, and they look to strange gods, and love the husks of the grapes.

2.text: And I bought her to me for fifteen pieces of silver, and for a core of barley, and for half a core of barley.

3.text: And I said to her: Thou shalt wait for me many days: thou shalt not play the harlot, and thou shalt be no manâ€™s, and I also will wait for thee.

4.text: For the children of Israel shall sit many days without king, and without prince, and without sacrifice, and without altar, and without ephod, and without theraphim.

5.text: And after this the children of Israel shall return, and shall seek the Lord their God, and David their king: and they shall fear the Lord, and his goodness in the last days.
